control.label: Choose stream or substream from strm|m3u playlist to add to addons.ini.
Import Playlist from strm|m3u playlist to add to addons.ini.
Import PVR channels and add to addons.ini.

control.description: Main Mainscreen Streamsetup Help about what to do
control.label: All available channels are in addons.ini. This will help you add your own channels.

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do
control.label: 1 | Choose stream or substream from strm|m3u|pvr playlist

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do 2
control.label: 2 | Add a channel from your Favourites

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do 2
control.label: 3 | Choose from your available channels in addons.ini. Subscribe for more.

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do 2
control.label: 4 | Subscribe will let you browse addons and choose channels to subscribe to in addons.ini. Refresh Addons.ini afterwards.

control.description: subscriptions Help about what to do
control.label: Click on the addon icon and wait until the addon loads. Then browse to the directory you want and click Add Folder button.
